name: Jump Tank
description:
Top-Down Tank Shooter made for VimJam 3.

Jam Focus: MULTI-USE: You can use the tank's gun to either shoot your enemies or shoot downwards to fly in the air momentarily.

Jam Theme: TURN UP THE HEAT: Every 15 seconds, the ground turns into LAVA that scorches all tanks present on the ground.

Credits: All assets used in the game were made by me.
